paper_abstract: Let G be a planar graph with maximum degree Delta such that G has no cycle of length from 4 to k, where k >= 4. Then the list chromatic index chi(1)'(G) = Delta and the list total chromatic number chi(1)"(G) = Delta + 1 if (Delta, k) is an element of {(7, 4), (6, 5), (5, 8)}. Furthermore, chi(1)'(G) = Delta if (Delta, k) is an element of {(4, 14)}. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V All rights reserved.
paper_title: List edge and list total colorings of planar graphs without 4-cycles
